DOC.brief_title: Comparison Safety Immune Response Influenza Vaccine Made New Manufacturing Process With Vaccine Made Traditional Manufacturing Process Season 2003/2004
DOC.criteria: Male female subject eligible participation study : > = 18 < = 60 year old ( Stratum A ) ; > 60 year old ( Stratum B ) ; physical condition physician would reservations vaccinate influenza vaccine outside scope clinical trial ; reliably keep daily record symptom ; understand nature study , agree provision , give write informed consent ; female capable bearing child show negative pregnancy test result study entry agree employ adequate birth control measure duration study . Male female subject exclude participation study : receive influenza vaccine 2002/2003 season and/or 2003/2004 season ; suffer kind immunodeficiency ; suffer disease ( e.g . autoimmune disease ) undergo form treatment ( e.g . systemic corticosteroid , chemotherapeutics ) expect influence immunological function ; history inflammatory degenerative neurological disease ( e.g . Guillain Barr√© , multiple sclerosis ) ; receive blood transfusion immunoglobulin within one month study entry ; history vaccinerelated contraindicate event ( e.g . anaphylaxis ) ; rash dermatological condition may interfere injection site reaction rating ; know suspect problem drug alcohol abuse ; unable lead independent life either physically mentally ; administration investigational drug within six week prior study start ; concurrently participate clinical trial ; pregnant lactating .
